line.text: That time of year thou mayst in me behold
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When yellow leaves or none or few do hang
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Upon those boughs which shake against the cold
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Bare ruined choirs where late the sweet birds sang
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In me thou seest the twilight of such day
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As after sunset fadeth in the west
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which by and by black night doth take away
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Death second self that seals up all in rest
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In me thou seest the glowing of such fire
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That on the ashes of his youth doth lie
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As the death-bed whereon it must expire
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Consumed with that which it was nourished by
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: This thou perceiv which makes thy love more strong
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To love that well which thou must leave ere long
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
